query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 ( MANDT, PSPID, POSID, INPT, SEQNO , GUBUN, BIGO, CDATE, CNAME, CTIME )
VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #PSPID#, #POSID#, 'D', ( SELECT SAPHEE.FILLINZERO(INT(VALUE(MAX(SEQNO),'0'))+1,3) AS SEQNO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSPID = #PSPID# AND POSID = #POSID# AND INPT = 'D' ), 'C' , '착공예정일 1차 저장: ' || substr(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4)||'-' ||substr(HEX(CURRENT DATE),5,2)||'-' ||substr(HEX(CURRENT DATE),7,2) , HEX(CURRENT DATE), #G_USER_ID#, HEX(CURRENT TIME) )
